description: This file is a React/Qwik component that defines the main route/page for a personal notes manager application. It handles fetching, displaying, creating, editing, and deleting notes, along with filtering by tags and searching.

methods.name: runRefresh
methods.description: Fetches notes from the API based on current query and active tag filters, and updates the state.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Triggers a refresh of the notes based on the current search query.

methods.name: onSelectTag
methods.description: Sets the active tag filter and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Prepares the modal for creating a new note.

methods.name: onEdit
methods.description: Prepares the modal for editing the selected note.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note after user confirmation and refreshes the list.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves a new or updated note via the API and refreshes the list.
